message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.DL, cs.SI, cs.CY

The paper presents a web tool for searching and visualizing news archives using an entity-centric approach. This involves automatic extraction and indexing of entity profiles, identification of entity names, jobs, quotations, and relations between entities from co-occurrence networks extracted from news articles. This suggests that the paper could belong to several arXiv CS sub-categories, including Information Retrieval (cs.IR) for the search functionality, Computational Linguistics (cs.CL) for the entity extraction and relation identification, Deep Learning (cs.DL) for the automatic extraction and indexing of entity profiles, Social and Information Networks (cs.SI) for the co-occurrence networks, and Cybersecurity (cs.CY) for the potential use of the tool in identifying and tracking entities involved in cyber threats.
